Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.event.ReadyAimFireInitCompletedEvent
    There will be no replacement for this event. Implement com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPushConfigureSdkListener instead. This event is posted via the EventBus. Register on the EventBus for this event type to see the data that ExactTarget sends to their servers.

    Sent when configureSdk() initialization completes.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETException.RAF_INITIALIZE_ENCRYPTION_FAILURE
    See ETException.CONFIGURE_SDK_INITIALIZE_ENCRYPTION_FAILURE instead.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETException.RAF_INITIALIZE_ENCRYPTION_OPTOUT_FAILURE
    See ETException.CONFIGURE_SDK_INITIALIZE_ENCRYPTION_OPTOUT_FAILURE instead.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETException.RAF_INITIALIZE_EXCEPTION
    See ETException.CONFIGURE_SDK_INITIALIZE_EXCEPTION instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.activityPaused(Activity)
    This method is only needed for Android versions prior to 14 and the minimum supported version for the JB4A SDK is 15.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.activityResumed(Activity)
    This method is only needed for Android versions prior to 14 and the minimum supported version for the JB4A SDK is 15.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETNotifications.createPendingIntentWithOpenAnalytics(Context, Intent, boolean)
    Use one of the other two methods to override notifications that will handle Analytics for you automatically.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.util.EventBus.getDefault()
    use EventBus.getInstance() instead.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.getNotificationAction()
    Use one of the other two methods to override notifications so that all SDK functionality is available such as silent pushes, Analytics
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.getNotificationActionUri()
    Use one of the other two methods to override notifications so that all SDK functionality is available such as silent pushes, Analytics
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETLocationManager.locationManager()
    use ETLocationManager.getInstance() instead.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.pushManager()
    use ETPush.getInstance() instead.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.readyAimFire(Application, String, String, String, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    as of 2015-04 see ETPush.configureSdk(ETPushConfig, ETPushConfigureSdkListener)
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.readyAimFire(Application, String, String, String, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)
    as of 2015-07 see (@link #configureSdk(ETPushConfig, ETPushConfigureSdkListener)}
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.readyAimFire(ETPushConfig)
    as of 2016-03 see ETPush.configureSdk(ETPushConfig, ETPushConfigureSdkListener)
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setCloudPageRecipient(Class<?>)
    Please use the ETPushConfig.Builder.setCloudPageRecipientClass(Class) (Class)} (Class)} Setter for the Activity that should launch when a notification with a CloudPage url is tapped.

    If you do not set this class, the SDK will launch the activity set in ETLandingPagePresenter

    If the url is invalid, the SDK will launch the application's Launcher activity.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setNotificationAction(String)
    Use one of the other two methods to override notifications so that all SDK functionality is available such as silent pushes, Analytics
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setNotificationActionUri(Uri)
    Use one of the other two methods to override notifications so that all SDK functionality is available such as silent pushes, Analytics
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setNotificationRecipientClass(Class<?>)
    Please use the ETPushConfig.Builder.setNotificationRecipientClass(Class) Setter for the Activity that should launch when a notification without a CloudPage or OpenDirect url is tapped.

    If you do not set this class, the SDK will launch the application's Launcher activity.

    To set the Activity that should launch when a notification with a CloudPage or OpenDirect url is tapped, see ETPush.setCloudPageRecipient(Class) or ETPush.setOpenDirectRecipient(Class).
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setNotificationResourceId(Integer)
    Please use the ETPushConfig.Builder.setNotificationResourceId(int) (Class)} Setter for the notification icon to be used in the notification.

    Each notification requires an icon to meet the specs provided by Google. Android 5.0 enforces those standards. http://developer.android.com/design/style/iconography.html#notification

    If you do not set this resource, then the SDK will use the default icon for your app which may not meet the standards for Android 5.0.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPush.setOpenDirectRecipient(Class<?>)
    Please use the ETPushConfig.Builder.setOpenDirectRecipientClass(Class) (Class)} Setter for the Activity that should launch when a notification with an OpenDirect url is tapped.

    If you do not set this class, the SDK will launch the activity set in ETLandingPagePresenter

    If the url is invalid, the SDK will launch the application's Launcher activity.
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPushConfig.Builder.setPiAnalyticsEnabled(boolean)
    com.exacttarget.etpushsdk.ETPushConfig.Builder.suppressGooglePlayServicesErrorNotifications(boolean)
    Please use ETPushConfigureSdkListener and check the ETRequestStatus instead.

    You may prevent the SDK from displaying the Google Play Services Error Notification by setting this value to true.
